tool_tip_html: Bodily Injury is the coverage associated with paying for the injuries to the other drivers who were involved in your possible future accidents.
Bodily Injury is the coverage associated with paying for the injuries to the other drivers who were involved in your possible future accidents.
Bodily Injury is the coverage associated with paying for the injuries to the other drivers who were involved in your possible future accidents.
Provides coverage for property damage for which the insured is legally liable as a result of an auto accident. This coverage is mandatory and is available at varied limits.
Provides coverage for property damage for which the insured is legally liable as a result of an auto accident. This coverage is mandatory and is available at varied limits.
Provides coverage for property damage for which the insured is legally liable as a result of an auto accident. This coverage is mandatory and is available at varied limits.
Uninsured Motorists Bodily Injury pays for injuries you or your passenger(s) received in a vehicle accident caused by a driver who does not have auto liability coverage.
Uninsured Motorists Bodily Injury pays for injuries you or your passenger(s) received in a vehicle accident caused by a driver who does not have auto liability coverage.
Uninsured Motorists Bodily Injury pays for injuries you or your passenger(s) received in a vehicle accident caused by a driver who does not have auto liability coverage.
Underinsured Motorists Bodily Injury provides additional coverage for your injuries when the at-fault party does not have enough insurance.
Underinsured Motorists Bodily Injury provides additional coverage for your injuries when the at-fault party does not have enough insurance.
Underinsured Motorists Bodily Injury provides additional coverage for your injuries when the at-fault party does not have enough insurance.
Provides coverage for additional medical expenses incurred as the result of personal injury covering the driver and passengers of an insured auto. This coverage is optional but often selected.
Provides coverage for additional medical expenses incurred as the result of personal injury covering the driver and passengers of an insured auto. This coverage is optional but often selected.
Comprehensive coverage helps pay damages to the vehicle if it encounters theft, fire, falling objects, vandalism, and more but not car collision.
Comprehensive coverage helps pay damages to the vehicle if it encounters theft, fire, falling objects, vandalism, and more but not car collision.

Provides coverage for a loss to an insured auto as a result of a covered loss less applicable deductible. If you have a loan or are financing an auto, financial institution likely requires this coverage.

Provides coverage for a loss to an insured auto as a result of a covered loss less applicable deductible. If you have a loan or are financing an auto, financial institution likely requires this coverage.

Provides reimbursement up to the daily and policy limit for rental expenses incurred for the rental of a substitute auto when the insured vehicle is involved in a covered loss and withdrawn from use over 24 hours.

Provides reimbursement up to the daily and policy limit for rental expenses incurred for the rental of a substitute auto when the insured vehicle is involved in a covered loss and withdrawn from use over 24 hours.
Provides reimbursement up to the applicable limit for towing costs necessitated by the disablement of an insured auto. Up to two (2) tows are allowed per policy period.
Provides reimbursement up to the applicable limit for towing costs necessitated by the disablement of an insured auto. Up to two (2) tows are allowed per policy period.
